programme.title: The Open Live
programme.desc: Coverage of the first day of the prestigious event, which takes place at Royal Troon Golf Club in Ayrshire. American Zach Johnson comes into the tournament as the defending champion, having won a three-way play-off with South Africa's Louis Oosthuizen and Australian Marc Leishman on the Old Course at St Andrews last year. That victory was the second Major title of Johnson's career, following on from his triumph at the 2007 Masters at Augusta.(n)

programme.title: The Open Live
programme.desc: Coverage of the second day of the prestigious event, which takes place at Royal Troon Golf Club in Ayrshire. Rory McIlroy won this event in 2014, but was unable to defend his title last year due to an ankle injury, which left the door open for the likes of Jordan Spieth, who was in red-hot form having won the previous two Majors. The Texan would eventually finish tied for fourth, one shot behind the three joint leaders, who went into a play-off.(n)

programme.sub-title: England v Pakistan: First Test Day One.
programme.desc: England v Pakistan. Coverage of the opening day of the First Test in the four-match series, which takes place at Lord's. The tourists will be looking to perform better than they did on their most recent outing at the `Home of Cricket' in 2010, when they lost by an innings and 225 runs. That victory for England sealed a 3-1 series triumph, with Jonathan Trott and Stuart Broad both scoring centuries in the home side's first innings.(n)

American Zach Johnson comes into the tournament as the defending champion, having won a three-way play-off with South Africa's Louis Oosthuizen and Australian Marc Leishman on the Old Course at St Andrews last year. That victory was the second Major title of Johnson's career, following on from his triumph at the 2007 Masters at Augusta.(n)
